person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Don Rieck , president of the National Animal Control Association , said aggressiveness in dogs was related more to gender than breed and a male dog that had not been neutered was three times more likely to bite than an unspayed female .

Let's think step by step.

The "Person" entities in the paragraph are:

1. Don Rieck
2. Don Rieck (again, as the subject of the sentence)

The sentence does not mention any other person, so there are only two "Person" entities in the paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Person.

Sure, my apologies for the mistake. Here are the corrected "Person" entities in the paragraph:

1. Don Rieck

Don Rieck is the president of the National Animal Control Association, and he is the person who made the statement about aggressiveness in dogs. Therefore, he is the only person mentioned in the paragraph.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the Markdown table with the "Person" entities in the paragraph:

| Person |
| --- |
| Don Rieck |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
